comments.comment:
Fonseka how can that boy register a 1000cc motor bike through RMV if that's illegal? If that was the case why didn't court raise that issue and free Patalie  and driver right away??? accused was trying to hide evidence and that was the concern. We have seen powerless victims trying to prove their innocence and get a fair decision and was suppressed by corrupt politicians. Also just don`t read your mind you come up as a fool when you talk about your family and your daughter`s who were babied in the US and having a great life what pain do you have about the poor people struggling for day to day life? You still talk BS inside a luxury
car also remember you were paid dearly to do a job during war times and non of that was charity work from you. We the people paid you to do a job and please don`t try to take extra credit as a superman. Most important part was done by the average soldier 
putting his life between life and death while you sit in a nice chair in Colombo. Even though when injustice was happening to average war hero`s where was your voice? Just get lost Fonseka you are done with people's mind.

Kariyo to jatakawela ati ballekutada  ..monawa unath rata berapu rnaviruwek toge ammagen ahapiya  towa jataka kare ballektada kiyala.topi me paksha 3nen koi akata Hari  kadeyana ballo topi tamai merata kawe wall balla tota amataka unada pasku da merate hama toth akka hama huthtekma kiwe 225apa kiyala aurudu 30k to dannawada palakayo minissunwa rawattuwa yako apita ,sajithda ,gotada,anurada,koi akath apita wadak Na  ,API ounwa ape hithwalin ain kare pasku damai ath mewage rata berapu maru kate idan ranaviruwek anith pakayalawage newei ranaviruwo hindai wal ballo api husma ganne aka danagan
